title: Account Settings & Privacy
description: Manage your account, privacy settings, and data preferences.
content:
Accessing Your Settings

Tap your profile picture in the bottom navigation, then select the gear icon (⚙️) in the top right corner to access all account settings.

Privacy Controls

Under 'Privacy Settings', you can control:

  • Account Privacy: Make your account private so only approved followers can see your posts
  • Activity Status: Control who can see when you're online
  • Story Settings: Choose who can view your stories
  • Blocked Accounts: View and manage accounts you've blocked

Security Settings

Keep your account secure with these options:

  • Two-Factor Authentication: Add an extra layer of security to your account
  • Login Activity: Review where your account is logged in
  • Password Change: Update your password regularly
  • App Permissions: Control which apps have access to your JOYIN data

Data & Download

You have control over your data:

  • Download Your Data: Request a copy of all your JOYIN data
  • Data Usage: Control how your data is used for personalization
  • Ad Preferences: Manage the ads you see on JOYIN

Deactivating or Deleting Your Account

If you need a break from JOYIN, you can temporarily deactivate your account. If you want to permanently delete it, visit the 'Account Management' section. Note: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed.
